alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Gadsden; Inland Bay; Jackson; Liberty (Florida) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued March 10 at 4:42PM EST by NWS Tallahassee
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Jackson, northeastern Bay and northern Calhoun Counties in the Panhandle of Florida, northwestern Gadsden and northwestern Liberty Counties in Big Bend of Florida through 530 PM EST/430 PM CST/... At 442 PM EST/342 PM CST/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Chattahoochee to 18 miles southeast of Chipley. Movement was east at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Quincy, Blountstown, Greensboro, Chattahoochee, Sneads, Gretna, Bristol, Grand Ridge, Altha, Rock Bluff, Moose Pond, Clarksville, Ocheesee, Juniper, Douglas City, Selman, Abe Springs, Rosedale, Union City and Chipola. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Calhoun; Gadsden; Inland Bay; Jackson; Liberty
